metadata.name: Birds of Paradise
metadata.description:
This animation was created by the amazing Jim Spendlove for my album 'Birds of Paradise'. 

The track playing is called 'Point Dume' It's my favorite from the album and I feel the sonics of it really capture the vibe of the animation.

The first owner of this NFT will get a rare signed copy of the album on vinyl (only about 300 in existence) and will also be eligible for 1 early access spot of Lofi Guy NFT.
